comment: The biophysical forcing data consists of the crop yield data provided by a subset of crop models, including: DSSAT-Pythia, EPIC-IIASA, LPJmL, PEPIC, pDSSAT, and GEPIC. Only crop yields  and not crop production, at GADM administrative level-2, are required. The gridded crop yield data will be aggregated to the sub-national level. Only the 2015soc and 2015soc-from-histsoc runs will be used.
